verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֭וֹב <WH2896> for [it is] good זַמְּרָ֣ה <WH2167> to sing praises אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> unto our God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָ֝עִים <WH5273> for [it is] pleasant נָאוָ֥ה <WH5000> is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> [and] praise
בּוֹנֵ֣ה <WH1129> doth build up יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> Jerusalem יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD נִדְחֵ֖י <WH1760> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel יְכַנֵּֽס׃ <WH3664> he gathereth together
הָ֭רֹפֵא <WH7495> He healeth לִשְׁב֣וּרֵי <WH7665> the broken לֵ֑ב <WH3820> in heart וּ֝מְחַבֵּ֗שׁ <WH2280> and bindeth up לְעַצְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH6094> their wounds
מוֹנֶ֣ה <WH4487> He telleth מִ֭סְפָּר <WH4557> the number לַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים <WH3556> of the stars לְ֝כֻלָּ֗ם <WH3605> to all שֵׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> them all by [their] names יִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> he calleth

גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> Great אֲדוֹנֵ֣ינוּ <WH113> [is] our Lord וְרַב־ <WH7227> and of great כֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> power לִ֝תְבוּנָת֗וֹ <WH8394> his understanding אֵ֣ין <WH369> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> [is] infinite
מְעוֹדֵ֣ד <WH5749> lifteth up עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> the meek יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD מַשְׁפִּ֖יל <WH8213> down רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> the wicked עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> eternity אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> to the ground
עֱנ֣וּ <WH6030> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> with thanksgiving זַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> sing praise לֵאלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> unto our God בְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> upon the harp

הַֽמְכַסֶּ֬ה <WH3680> Who covereth שָׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <WH8064> the heaven בְּעָבִ֗ים <WH5645> with clouds הַמֵּכִ֣ין <WH3559> who prepareth לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> for the earth מָטָ֑ר <WH4306> rain הַמַּצְמִ֖יחַ <WH6779> to grow הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> upon the mountains חָצִֽיר׃ <WH2682> who maketh grass

נוֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> He giveth לִבְהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> to the beast לַחְמָ֑הּ <WH3899> his food לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> [and] to the young עֹ֝רֵ֗ב <WH6158> ravens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> which cry

לֹ֤א <WH3808> not בִגְבוּרַ֣ת <WH1369> not in the strength הַסּ֣וּס <WH5483> of the horse יֶחְפָּ֑ץ <WH2654> He delighteth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not בְשׁוֹקֵ֖י <WH7785> in the legs הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of a man יִרְצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> he taketh not pleasure

רוֹצֶ֣ה <WH7521> taketh pleasure יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְרֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> in them that fear אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <WH3176> him in those that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> in his mercy
שַׁבְּחִ֣י <WH7623> Praise יְ֭רוּשָׁלִַם <WH3389> O Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הַֽלְלִ֖י <WH1984> praise אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <WH430> thy God צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> O Zion

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חִ֭זַּק <WH2388> For he hath strengthened בְּרִיחֵ֣י <WH1280> the bars שְׁעָרָ֑יִךְ <WH8179> of thy gates בֵּרַ֖ךְ <WH1288> he hath blessed בָּנַ֣יִךְ <WH1121> thy children בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <WH7130> within
הַשָּׂם־ <WH7760> He maketh גְּבוּלֵ֥ךְ <WH1366> [in] thy borders שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> peace חֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> thee with the finest חִ֝טִּ֗ים <WH2406> of the wheat יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽךְ׃ <WH7646> [and] filleth

הַשֹּׁלֵ֣חַ <WH7971> He sendeth forth אִמְרָת֣וֹ <WH565> his commandment אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> [upon] earth עַד־ <WH5704> very מְ֝הֵרָ֗ה <WH4120> very swiftly יָר֥וּץ <WH7323> runneth דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> his word
הַנֹּתֵ֣ן <WH5414> He giveth שֶׁ֣לֶג <WH7950> snow כַּצָּ֑מֶר <WH6785> like wool כְּ֝פ֗וֹר <WH3713> the hoarfrost כָּאֵ֥פֶר <WH665> like ashes יְפַזֵּֽר׃ <WH6340> he scattereth
מַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> He casteth forth קַֽרְח֣וֹ <WH7140> his ice כְפִתִּ֑ים <WH6595> like morsels לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before קָ֝רָת֗וֹ <WH7135> cold מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> who can stand

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He sendeth out דְּבָר֣וֹ <WH1697> his word וְיַמְסֵ֑ם <WH4529> and melteth יַשֵּׁ֥ב <WH5380> to blow ר֝וּח֗וֹ <WH7307> them he causeth his wind יִזְּלוּ־ <WH5140> flow מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> [and] the waters

מַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> He sheweth [דְּבָרֹו כ] (דְּבָרָ֣יו <WH1697> act ק) לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> unto Jacob חֻקָּ֥יו <WH2706> his statutes וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטָ֗יו <WH4941> and his judgments לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> unto Israel

לֹ֘א <WH3808> has not עָ֤שָׂה <WH6213> He hath not dealt כֵ֨ן ׀ <WH3651> thus לְכָל־ <WH3605> any גּ֗וֹי <WH1471> so with any nation וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֥ים <WH4941> and [as for his] judgments בַּל־ <WH1077> have not יְדָע֗וּם <WH3045> they have not known הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> them Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
